comment:
* Listener registered by client to be notified upon new audio port connections,
     * disconnections or attributes update.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void onAudioPortListUpdate(AudioPort[] portList)
methods.comment:
* Callback method called upon audio port list update.
         * @param portList the updated list of audio ports

methods.name: public void onAudioPatchListUpdate(AudioPatch[] patchList)
methods.comment:
* Callback method called upon audio patch list update.
         * @param patchList the updated list of audio patches

methods.name: public void onServiceDied()
methods.comment: * Callback method called when the mediaserver dies
